32130.name: Penguins’ Journey
32130.description:
Shovel, pound and piece together wooden puzzle bridges to help your penguin friends escape to their homeland! Since these penguins are from Penguin Farm, they’ve never learned to swim, so it’s up to you to help them reach Antarctica by building bridges over muddy marshes and vast oceans!

Watch out for pesky frogs and other crazy distractions that will try to push your penguins overboard! Pick up bonus bottles along the way that contain useful powerups and points! And, give it your all in fun bonus games along the way. Don’t leave your penguin buddies behind—build a bridge!

  • Cute and quirky characters
  • 45 levels in three environments
  • Three fun bonus games!
  • 14 awards to win
32130.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
